name: UsePythonVersion
description: Retrieves the specified version of Python from the tool cache. Optionally add it to PATH.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: versionSpec
inputs.label: Version spec
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version specifier of Python you want to use.

inputs.name: outputVariable
inputs.label: Output variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set a name for the build variable that will contain the directory of the decompressed Python distribution. You can use this in subsequent tasks to access your installation of Python.

inputs.name: addToPath
inputs.label: Add to PATH
inputs.helpMarkDown: Prepend the retrieved Python version to PATH so that it is available in subsequent tasks or scripts without using the output variable.
